biography: Claudio Biern Boyd is a Spanish animator and founder of the Spanish animation studio BRB Internacional. He created the television shows The World of David the Gnome, Around the World with Willy Fog, Dogtanian and the Three Muskehounds and Gladiator Academy, among other projects.
name: Claudio Biern Boyd
place_of_birth: Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca, Balearic Islands, Spain
